user_input:
Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Methane as the complement not the carrier
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Methane as the complement (not the carrier). No PLEXOS DB access required.

tasks.description: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050; split the nodes; and use Methane as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Convert the generated Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles into TYNDP Study Team (tst) format with carrier set to 'Hybrid Heat Pump'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
